subject: Basketball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: The 7-foot-6 center from the Sudan was a dominant shot blocker in the National Basketball Association and later returned to his homeland to try to heal the wounds of a civil war.
snippet: The 7-foot-6 center from the Sudan was a dominant shot blocker in the National Basketball Association and later returned to his homeland to try to heal the wounds of a civil war.
